ygData.subject: Re: Is it safe to sing AE songs in dungeons now?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I use them in both Sol B and Lower Guk without any problems now (at least on the weekends, which is the only time I get to play).  I used to use them even
ygData.messageBody:
Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>
> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> With overcrowding a problem on almost every server, I'm wondering if it
> is now safe to add these songs back to our playlist. ...
>
> Galtin of E'ci
> 35 bard

I use them in both Sol B and Lower Guk without any problems now (at least
on the weekends, which is the only time I get to play). I used to use
them even in less crowded dungeons, but this was back when Lullaby was
actually worth something, and you could actually do something if you
pulled a train by accident. Sigh.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 45 songs, Innoruuk
